name: admin.conversations.restrictAccess.listGroups
desc: List all IDP Groups linked to a channel

team_id.desc: The workspace where the channel exists. This argument is required for channels only tied to one workspace, and optional for channels that are shared across an organization.

errors.invalid_auth: Token does not belong to enterprise or team id passed in not part of this enterprise
errors.invalid_channel: The requested channel couldnâ€™t be linked to an IDP group. It might be a public channel or an externally-shared channel.
errors.not_an_admin: This token doesn't belong to an Org Admin or Owner.
